name: The Spiders Web
description:
Welcome To...

The Spiders Web

---Instructions---

play Button = starts the game

spider Button = change spider

setting button = uhhh settings?

the spider follows your mouse

click to shoot (you can hold click)

eliminate other critters to gain food

watch out for bugs that will steal from you

watch out for bugs that harm you

there are golden beetles and fly's that are worth more points

gain powerups
